short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clicks a selected element at user-defined intervals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Exclusively designed for use with IFS Cloud. This extension allows you to update your page without refreshing the whole site. Simply open the extension and select your element. (recommend the refresh icon in the breadcrumb trail or using the "apply" button to refresh a filter.) Set your desired interval and start the extension. Great for migration tasks that involve background jobs.
